amendment.description: To protect the American taxpayer by establishing metrics to measure the effectiveness of grants administered by the national levee safety program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 833 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 833 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
